name: In the Shadows (itch) (Compute Studios)
description:
Story

As the newest park ranger at Conifer Basin State park, it is your job to take the night shift of scouting the area. Sounds easy right? But what they didn't tell you before you took the job was that there have been many mysterious reports of dead bodies in the area as well as paranormal activity.

Gameplay

Survive until 5 am. Use your flashlight to scare off the red staring eyes. Explore the park to find more batteries for your flashlight as well as to discover the story behind Conifer Basin State Park.

This game was submitted to the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 * Press the "Esc" key at any time to leave the game * Credits

- Created by Compute Studios.

- Bulldog Games for giving permission to use certain 3D models.

- Unity for providing game engine.
